column1: Topic title: DAP Lim Lip Eng  Issued Another 48 Hours Ultimatum

column8: text

SSx3hKrnhvwSummary1. DAP Lim Lip Eng claim he got news from immigration that Johnson Lee is in Thailand.2. DAP Lim Lip Eng issue another  48 Hours Ultimatum to JJPTR founder Johnson Lee and his father to come forward and explain the “missing” RM500 million, allegedly hacked from the company’s account.3. If JJPTR founder Johnson Lee and his father didnt come forward by May 1, Lim Lip Eng said DAP will use whatever mean to bring down JJPTR included report to authority like police, BNM, and KPDNKKhttp://www.chinapress.com.my/?p=950725
